data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Can Philadelphia capitalize from this throw-in deep inside DC United's half?
In the minute 3, It's a goal kick for the away team in Chester.
Sergio Santos of Philadelphia gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for DC United at Subaru Park.
In the minute 4, Can Philadelphia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in DC United's half?
Philadelphia have been awarded a corner by Fotis Bazakos.
DC United have a goal kick.
In the minute 7, Corner awarded to Philadelphia.
Goal! Kacper Przybylko gives Philadelphia a 1-0 lead in Chester.
Fotis Bazakos signals a throw-in for Philadelphia, close to DC United's area.
In the minute 9, Fotis Bazakos signals a free kick to DC United in their own half.
Fotis Bazakos signals a free kick to DC United.
Jose Martinez (Philadelphia) has received a yellow card from Fotis Bazakos.
In the minute 12, Yamil Asad for DC United drives towards goal at Subaru Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
DC United have been awarded a corner by Fotis Bazakos.
DC United's Axel Sjoberg goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 13, DC United needs to be cautious. Philadelphia have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to Philadelphia.
In Chester Philadelphia drive forward through Jamiro Monteiro. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 16, Goal! Philadelphia extend their lead to 2-0 through Kacper Przybylko.
In Chester, Yamil Asad of DC United is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to DC United.
In the minute 18, DC United to take a throw-in in Philadelphia territory.
In Chester a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Felipe Martins (DC United) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 20, Philadelphia's Brendan Aaronson gets in a shot but it is blocked by a DC United defender.
It's now 3-0 in Chester as Sergio Santos scores for Philadelphia.
Jose Martinez instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 23, Yamil Asad for DC United is whistled offside.
Attention is being given to Philadelphiaâ€™s Kai Wagner and play has been suspended briefly.
Kai Wagner returns to the field for Philadelphia after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 25, Fotis Bazakos signals a Philadelphia throw-in in DC United's half.
Philadelphia push forward at Subaru Park and Alejandro Bedoya gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined DC United defence.
Throw-in high up the field for Philadelphia in Chester.
In the minute 26, Philadelphia's Jamiro Monteiro gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a DC United goal kick.
The match at Subaru Park has been interrupted briefly for a check on Kai Wagner, who is down injured.
In the minute 27, Matt Real (Philadelphia) has replaced the possibly injured Kai Wagner at Subaru Park.
Throw-in DC United.
Fotis Bazakos awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 31, Free kick DC United.
DC United have been awarded a corner by Fotis Bazakos.
DC United's Julian Gressel gets in a shot on goal at Subaru Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Philadelphia in the half of DC United.
Throw-in for DC United at Subaru Park.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 36, Free kick for Philadelphia in the half of DC United.
Philadelphia drive forward but Alejandro Bedoya is judged offside.
DC United awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 38, DC United have a dangerous throw-in.
DC United's Junior Moreno misses with an attempt on goal.
Fotis Bazakos awards Philadelphia a goal kick.
In the minute 40, DC United awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for DC United in their own half.
Philadelphia are pushing forward but Alejandro Bedoya's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 42, Fotis Bazakos awards DC United a goal kick.
In Chester a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for DC United in their own half.
In the minute 43, Ball safe as Philadelphia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Brendan Aaronson (Philadelphia) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Fotis Bazakos signals a Philadelphia throw-in in DC United's half.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
Important block from the DC United defence as Brendan Aaronson fires in a strike for Philadelphia.
Throw-in for Philadelphia in their own half.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Ball goes out of play for a DC United goal kick.
Can Philadelphia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in DC United's half?
Jim Curtin is making the team's second substitution at Subaru Park with Warren Creavalle replacing Jose Martinez.
In the minute 47, Kacper Przybylko (Philadelphia) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
The away team have replaced Yamil Asad with Griffin Yow. This is the first substitution made today by Ben Olsen.
Philadelphia have been awarded a corner by Fotis Bazakos.
Goal kick for DC United at Subaru Park.
In the minute 48, Philadelphia drive upfield and Matt Real gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a DC United defender.
Throw-in for Philadelphia close to the penalty box.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Chester to check on Julian Gressel, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 50, Fotis Bazakos awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Philadelphia in the half of DC United.
Julian Gressel is back on the pitch.
In the minute 51, Philadelphia to take a throw-in in DC United territory.
DC United's Ulises Segura breaks free at Subaru Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Chester.
In the minute 53, Sergio Santos (Philadelphia) fires in a shot â€“ and hits the post!
Corner awarded to Philadelphia.
Philadelphia are coming forward and Olivier Mbaizo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 54, DC United have a goal kick.
Free kick for DC United in the half of Philadelphia.
Olivier Mbaizo (Philadelphia) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Throw-in for Philadelphia at Subaru Park.
In the minute 57, Ben Olsen (DC United) is making a second substitution, with Erik Sorga replacing Ola Kamara.
Ball goes out of play for a Philadelphia goal kick.
In the minute 59, DC United awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Philadelphia in their own half.
Goal! Brendan Aaronson extends Philadelphia's lead to 4-0.
In the minute 61, Kacper Przybylko with an assist there.
Goal! DC United reduce the deficit to 4-1 through Julian Gressel.
Great play from Junior Moreno to set up the goal.
In the minute 65, Andrew Wooten is replacing Kacper Przybylko for the home team.
Philadelphia make their fourth substitution with Ilsinho replacing Sergio Santos.
In the minute 66, Philadelphia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as DC United is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The away team replace Junior Moreno with Mohammed Abu.
In the minute 68, DC United have been awarded a corner by Fotis Bazakos.
Free kick DC United.
Philadelphia's Ilsinho has been booked in Chester.
In the minute 70, Fotis Bazakos signals a DC United throw-in in Philadelphia's half.
Fotis Bazakos signals a free kick to DC United.
Corner awarded to DC United.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for DC United in the half of Philadelphia.
Throw-in Philadelphia.
Philadelphia to take a throw-in in DC United territory.
In the minute 73, Fotis Bazakos awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Philadelphia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in DC United's half?
Fotis Bazakos signals a free kick to DC United in their own half.
In the minute 77, Andrew Wooten gets his shot on target but fails to score for Philadelphia.
Philadelphia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Moses Nyeman is replacing Julian Gressel for DC United at Subaru Park.
Philadelphia have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 80, At Subaru Park, Warren Creavalle has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Free kick for DC United in their own half.
In the minute 82, In Chester DC United attack through Felipe Martins. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Philadelphia at Subaru Park.
DC United's Erik Sorga misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 85, Fotis Bazakos awards Philadelphia a goal kick.
In Chester a free kick has been awarded the away team.
DC United push forward at Subaru Park and Donovan Pines gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Philadelphia defence.
In the minute 87, In Chester Philadelphia's Andrew Wooten is caught offside.
Free kick DC United.
Jamiro Monteiro for Philadelphia has been booked by Fotis Bazakos and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 88, Jack de Vries is on a sub for Brendan Aaronson for Philadelphia.
Corner awarded to DC United.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Chester.
Philadelphia's Andrew Wooten gets in a shot but it is blocked by a DC United defender.
Fotis Bazakos signals a free kick to DC United in their own half.
Fotis Bazakos will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Philadelphia needs to be cautious. DC United have an attacking throw-in.
Philadelphia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in DC United.
The second-half is over. The match ends 4-1.
